"Superdreadnought Automata":
"Have you seen it yet? It's crazy, as in crazy dangerous!
And it's huge! And when I say huge, I mean ginormous!
I've never seen an automata that big. It's called a Big
Varder. How can an automata get that big?! Talk about
cheating! How's a guy supposed take that down?!
Even I think I'll pass! Of course, I could totally handle it
if I really tried. How about you? Think you could handle it?
If so, do you, uh, mind showing me how?
*Target: Hostiles level 21 or higher"

"やべえやべえあれマジやべえ！
おたく見てないのかよ！　デカいなんて
レベルじゃなかっただろ、あれ！
ビッグヴァーダーって機甲種のことだよ！
なんだよあの大きさ、反則だろ！　無理！
流石のオレもあれ相手は拒否るね。
本気出せばやれないこともないけどよ。
おたくはどうよ？　やれそうだと思うか？
ならちょっと、オレに見せつけてくれよ！
※Lv.21～のエネミーが対象"
